name: Resurrection
effect:
:instant: Cancel an attack that would reduce your \* [unit's](../units/index.md) :health_points: to 0. You can cast this spell immediately after the enemy [unit's](../units/index.md) attack.

:empower: 0 ➣ \*:bronze:
:empower: 2 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver:
:empower: 4 ➣ \*:bronze: or :silver: or :golden:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: Only damage from an attack can be nullified. If the health points are reduced by other means of damage (such as abilities, spells, specialties, etc.), Resurrection cannot be played.
If damage from an attack is nullified, the resurrected unit will not retaliate, even if it has not performed a retaliation this round.
